00092 /* container class for the miscellaneous non-core objects, not
00093    including the L2, but up to and including the front-side bus */
00094 class uncore_t : public Processor
00095 {
00096   protected:
00097   unsigned int last_vc;
00098 
00099   /*Converts a request into a bitstream*/
00100   void convertToBitStream(Request* req, HighLevelPacket* hlp);
00101   /*Converts a bitstream into a request*/
00102   void convertFromBitStream(Request* req, HighLevelPacket *hlp);
00103   /*packet recieved from network sent to LLC*/
00104   void handle_new_packet_event(IrisEvent* e);
00105   /*Ready event sent by network interface*/
00106   void handle_ready_event(IrisEvent* e);
00107   /*Event handler for the uncore*/
00108   void process_event(IrisEvent* e);
00109 
00110   public:
00111 
00112   uint32_t virtual_channels;    //maximum number of packets that can be sent in parallel from the uncore
00113   uint32_t tile_count;          //The number of tiles in the CMP
00114   unsigned int num_cores;
00115 
00116   double cpu_speed; /* CPU speed in MHz */
00117   int cpu_ratio; /*ratio between CPU speed and memory bus speed*/
00118 
00119   /*Pointer to the cores that are part of this uncore tile We set maximum cores per tile as 4 though this can be increased*/
00120   struct core_t *core[4];
00121 
00122   /*Id of the uncore generally it is 1 to number of uncores*/
00123   /*NOTE: This is not the same as the id of the uncore in the mesh as the mesh has */
00124   unsigned int id;
00125   
00126   /* shared last-level cache */
00127   struct bus_t * LLC_bus;
00128   struct cache_t * LLC;
00129   tick_t LLC_cycle_mask;
00130 
00131   /* coherence request buffers */
00132   int creq_size;
00133   int creq_num;
00134   int creq_head;
00135   int creq_tail;
00136   struct coherence_req *creq;
00137 
00138   /*Uncore statistics*/
00139   struct uncore_stat_t {
00140   counter_t packets_out;
00141   counter_t packets_in;
00142   counter_t min_pkt_latency;
00143   counter_t last_packet_out_cycle;
00144   counter_t fwd_path_delay;
00145   counter_t round_trip_lat;
00146   counter_t TotalBLP;
00147   counter_t round_trip_network_latency;
00148   counter_t round_trip_hop_count;
00149   counter_t round_trip_memory_latency;
00150   counter_t waiting_in_ni;
00151   }stat;
00152 
00153   /*Functions called by the LLC to send a request */
00154   bool enqueuable(const md_paddr_t addr,const enum cache_command cmd,tick_t when_enqueued);
00155   void enqueue(struct cache_t * const prev_cp,const enum cache_command cmd,const md_paddr_t addr,const int linesize,const seq_t action_id,
00156                         const int MSHR_bank,const int MSHR_index,void * const op,void (*const cb)(void *),seq_t (*const get_action_id)(void *));
00157 
00158   vector<bool> ready;
00159   bool sending;
00160   bool compare();
00161   uint sending_vc;
00162   ullint lastSentTime;
00163   vector <unsigned int> mc_node_ip;
00164 
00165   void uncore_reg_stats(struct uncore_t * uncore, struct stat_sdb_t * const sdb);
00166 
00167   FILE *app_mem_trace;  /*Memory trace of the application at the backside of cache*/
00168   bool log_trace;       /*Start logging trace flag set by the core*/
00169   
00170   void setup(uint no_nodes, uint vcs, uint max_sim_time);
00171   string toString () const;
00172   string print_stats() const;
00173   void set_output_path( string outpath_name );  
00174   /* constructor */
00175   uncore_t(unsigned int arg_id, const double arg_cpu_speed, unsigned int arg_virtual_channels,unsigned int arg_tile_count );
00176   virtual ~uncore_t();
00177 
00178 };
